alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Greene; Western Columbia; Western Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 6:06PM EST until January 05 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 11 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Light freezing rain and or freezing drizzle expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Columbia and Greene Counties of east central New York and the Berkshires of western Massachusetts. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 11 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact travel through the morning hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia; Eastern Greene; Western Columbia; Western Greene
